question: If you were to find yourself in a battle, what weapon would you choose??

answers.text: A Sword
A Shield
A Battlestaff
Let the Architects Decide
Someone that looks to protect others at all costs through strength, sacrifice, and mercilessness
Someone that dedicates their time and resources to learning and understanding true power
A lone wolf that aims to make their own luck and take that big risk for the big reward
The Architects know me best

question: You see an ally in danger. What do you do?

answers.text: Abuse the advanced power you have dedicated your time to harness to defeat the enemy
Be elusive until you find the perfect time to deliver a deadly strike
Immediately rush to their aid and fight by their side
The Architects have already decided the outcome of this conflict

question: You and your fireteam are about to engage the enemy. How do you prefer to fight?

answers.text: Put me in the thick of it and keep the enemy off my teammates
Just behind my teammates, right where my power and abilities are at their strongest
Dancing around the edge of the fight and quick to the killing blow
Let the Architects take the wheel

question: Which set of skills is most appealing?

answers.text: Nimble and elusive movements that make it easy to be a nuissance but deadly
Powerful melee ability combined with space magic
Very fast linear movements combined with raw strength and toughness
Leave it to the Architects
